name: simple-dijs
description: Simple Javascript Dependency Injection Container (DI) like Pimple

scripts.test: bash -c 'node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli.js cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha' && npm run browser-test
scripts.browser-test: bash -c 'node_modules/.bin/browserify test/di.js -o test/browser/di.js' && bash -c 'node_modules/.bin/mocha-phantomjs test/browser/browser.html' && rm test/browser/di.js
scripts.build-dist: bash -c 'mkdir -p dist' && bash -c 'node_modules/.bin/browserify src/di.js --standalone Di -o dist/di.js'
scripts.build: npm run build-dist && npm run jshint && npm run test

author: Aubin VIGHIER
